trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_TALK_ACTOR_02<tab>...<var 29 EA02 /var>, was it? If that is your desire, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, then it shall be done.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_001_Q1<tab>Retire <var 29 EA02 /var>? ※Retired chocobos cannot be re-registered as race chocobos.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_001_01<tab>I see you are resolved. Very well. What parting words have you for your chocobo?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_001_02<tab>Praising a chocobo's acquired ability will transform it into a hereditary ability, which can be passed down through generations.

TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_002_A2<tab>Fare thee well, old friend. I'll never forget you─nor your mastery of <var 28 ((ChocoboRaceAbility)) E80201 /var>, and how it carried us to victory!
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_002_A3<tab>No, not yet! I am not ready to say good-bye!
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_002_01<tab>...Your chocobo shall enjoy a life of luxury─of that you can be assured.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_002_02<tab>As a reminder, take care not to misplace your retired chocobo registration form.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_002_03<tab>Should you wish to arrange a covering, you will need to present it to Katering at Moogle's Gift Mounts.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_RETIRE_003_01<tab>Very well. You needn't concern yourself with this one any longer.

TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_ERROR_001_01<tab>Begging your pardons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but your hands seem rather full at the moment. Mayhap you should see to your possessions before discussing this matter with me.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_ERROR_001_02<tab>You cannot retire a chocobo without space in your inventory to store the retired chocobo registration form.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_TALK_ACTOR<tab>If that is your desire, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, then it shall be done.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_ERROR_002_01<tab>How odd. You did say you wished to retire a chocobo, did you not? Yet according to my records, you do not have a race chocobo registered.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERETIRE_00232_ERROR_002_02<tab>Only a registered race chocobo with a rank of 40 or higher can be retired.
